assetProfile.address2: MIDC, Santacruz Elect. Exp. Proc. Zone Andheri (East)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Goldiam International Limited manufactures and sells diamond studded gold and silver jewelry in India. The company operates in two segments, Jewellery Manufacturing Activity and Investment Activity. It also exports its products to the United States, Europe, and other countries. Goldiam International Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Mumbai, India.
